entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump Over 40 million Americans unemployed and you’re bragging about the stock market.If COVID19 has proven anything its that the stock market is in no way a reflection as to how poorly or how well the economy is doing.But you are right next year will be best because you will be gone..
